name: Messages are gated off when amp is not on
Closed loop, queued and metered message transmission
Closed loop checking to see if amp is online
Two second period at startup to determine amp state
Power button and power state indicator
Mode control and state indicator, closed loop
closed loop reporting for ON state
Message and data processing and display
Overall design goals READ ME
info:
Make sure all indicators are based on true state of the amplifier, i.e. do not base them on button clicks, but only on the receipt of actual messages from the amp.
Make sure that data is transmitted to the amp cleanly, wait for semicolons on responses, don't let amp input buffer get overwhelmed.
Get responsive, buttery smooth display of important parameters (e.g. forward RF power). To do this low speed queries must be evenly interspersed with high speed queries, queries should not go in "clumps".
Pay attention to idiosyncracies in the amp firmware and suppress display of data that should be suppressed when amp is OFF or in RX.
